content:
Excellent! I'm glad to hear that my estimates were close to your actual experience. 1,200 miles and 18 hours with stops is a very reasonable and realistic estimate for a road trip from the Bay Area to Denver.

It's always great to have real-world feedback and data to refine my estimates. I'll make sure to keep your experience in mind for future conversations about road trips from the Bay Area to Denver.

I hope you had a great time on your trip and enjoyed your visit to Denver! Did you have any favorite stops or attractions along the way, or was there anything that surprised you or stood out during your trip?
